channel.title: How do i add a timer so that people can't mass click an object?
channel.description: How do i add a timer so that people aren't able to click 5 times a second on an object? If you can help, thanks.

item.title: How do i add a timer so that people can't mass click an object?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Try using ‘actionTimer’

case 823: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You whack the dummy and gain HP experience."); addSkillXP((4*playerLevel[0]), 0); actionTimer = 5; break; }
If that doesn’t work, use ‘Delay = *;’
Just change the message, addSkillXP part, and case ID.
If you don’t want the EXP * level then you would replace your current addSkillXP line with

addSkillXP(4, 0);

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a timer so that people can't mass click an object?
